skins.shipDescription: Sims-class destroyer - Sims, Hull Number DD-409!
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Sims, the name ship of the Sims-class. Commander... don't even think about mentioning the Battle of the Coral Sea in front of me. It instinctively makes me want to pull pranks on people~
skins.acquisition: So you're the commander... I'm Sims, the name ship of the Sims class of destroyers. Hehe, nice to meet you!
skins.login: Welcome back, Commander... Hmm? No, I didn't see who hid your stuff.
skins.details: Look, Commander, I won't level up just from you staring at me.
skins.secretaryIdle1: You know, I've got a little sister called Morris. She's just so fun to tease~
skins.secretaryIdle2: Try to find out how many surprises I've got in store for you, Commander!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Come on, let's play! Ahaha! Tickle tickle!
skins.secretaryTouch: Don't you find this hobby of yours a bit strange...?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: ... You'd better be ready when you're going to sleep tonight, Commander!

skins.shipDescription: Y'know, Commander~ No matter how nice you are to me, I'm still going to prank you~ Oh, but if you want my help with pranking others, I'll consider it~ Heehee~
skins.acquisition: Y'know, Commander~ No matter how nice you are to me, I'm still going to prank you~ Oh, but if you want my help with pranking others, I'll consider it~ Heehee~
skins.login: Commander, would you rather have an ultra-spicy or ultra-salty cake~?
skins.details: Hey, Commander~ You look like you're free, so let's play a game.
skins.secretaryIdle1: That thing when you think you've been pranked even though I haven't actually done anything is a prank of sorts, too~
skins.secretaryIdle2: Hmm... You've gotten too used to my old bag of tricks, so it's time to come up with some new ones! ... Whoops, sorry~ First, I'll need to finish all this work~
skins.secretaryIdle3: Hey, Commander~ Don't you agree Hammann's reaction when she got pranked was just hilarious?
skins.secretaryTouch: Ahahahahaha! That tickles! Stop it, Commander! Okay, I'm sorry! I'm sorry for pranking you! Ahahahahaha!
